TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyEntry extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.MemberEntry

summary.para: Provides access to change tracking information and operations for a given property.
Instances of this class are returned from methods when using the API and it is not designed to be directly constructed in your application code.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object CurrentValue { get; set; }
.property instance object CurrentValue
Public Overridable Property CurrentValue As Object

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value currently assigned to this property. If the current value is set using this property, the change tracker is aware of the change and is not required for the context to detect the change.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsModified { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsModified
Public Overrides Property IsModified As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of this property has been modified and should be updated in the database when is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsTemporary { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsTemporary
Public Overridable Property IsTemporary As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of this property is considered a temporary value which will be replaced by a value generated from the store when is called.

Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Metadata As IProperty

Docs.summary: Gets the metadata that describes the facets of this property and how it maps to the database.

public virtual object OriginalValue { get; set; }
.property instance object OriginalValue
Public Overridable Property OriginalValue As Object

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value that was assigned to this property when it was retrieved from the database. This property is populated when an entity is retrieved from the database, but setting it may be useful in disconnected scenarios where entities are retrieved with one context instance and saved with a different context instance.
